Detailed Description

seDRMSymbol wraps the DRM <Symbol> class.

Author:
Warren Macchi

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMSymbol::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference.
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_SYMBOL

Reimplemented from sedris::seDRMIcon.
